content: Social time between the talks will be held at Gather.town ; the link is here https://app.gather.town/invite?token=DzDg-aGSTtSPXCJaMhAn . The first time you click on this link you'll have to register in some way IIRC.

Kevin Buzzard said:

The first time you click on this link you'll have to register in some way

FYI for others.

I have never used Gather.town. This is what I am presented with as a first visit to the noted link.

image.png

Thanks -- I had forgotten what the process was because I did this a while ago. Note that no part of the conference will be taking place on Gather; this is purely for people to chat in the breaks and is completely optional.
